description:
Do you fly remote control airplanes or helicopters?
Want to know how long you can safely fly on your battery pack?

This app lets you easily and quickly determine the optimal flight time. All you do is enter the number of cells in your lithium polymer battery pack, voltage after your last flight and the duration of your last flight.

The app then calculates your maximum flight time that will leave a 20% charge left in your battery pack.
